00022 #region Usings
00023 using System;
00024 using System.Collections.Generic;
00025 using System.IO;
00026 using System.Text.RegularExpressions;
00027 using Utilities.IO;
00028 #endregion
00029 
00030 namespace Utilities.Web.Youtube
00031 {
00035     public static class Youtube
00036     {
00037         #region Public Static Functions
00038 
00044         public static void GetMovie(string FileLocation, string Url)
00045         {
00046             try
00047             {
00048                 string Content = FileManager.GetFileContents(new Uri(Url));
00049                 Regex TempRegex = new Regex("'SWF_ARGS': {(.*)}");
00050                 Match Match = TempRegex.Match(Content);
00051                 Content = Match.Value;
00052                 TempRegex = new Regex("\"video_id\": \"(.*?\")");
00053                 string VideoLocation = "http://www.youtube.com/get_video?video_id=";
00054                 Match = TempRegex.Match(Content);
00055                 VideoLocation += Match.Groups[1].Value.Replace("\"", "");
00056                 VideoLocation += "&l=";
00057                 TempRegex = new Regex("\"length_seconds\": \"(.*?\")");
00058                 Match = TempRegex.Match(Content);
00059                 VideoLocation += Match.Groups[1].Value.Replace("\"", "");
00060                 VideoLocation += "&t=";
00061                 TempRegex = new Regex("\"t\": \"(.*?\")");
00062                 Match = TempRegex.Match(Content);
00063                 VideoLocation += Match.Groups[1].Value.Replace("\"", "");
00064                 Stream TempStream;
00065                 FileManager.GetFileContents(new Uri(VideoLocation), out TempStream);
00066                 BinaryReader TempReader = new BinaryReader(TempStream);
00067                 List<byte> Bytes = new List<byte>();
00068                 while (true)
00069                 {
00070                     byte[] Buffer = new byte[1024];
00071                     int Length = TempReader.Read(Buffer, 0, 1024);
00072                     if (Length == 0)
00073                         break;
00074                     for (int x = 0; x < Length; ++x)
00075                     {
00076                         Bytes.Add(Buffer[x]);
00077                     }
00078                 }
00079                 TempStream.Dispose();
00080                 FileManager.SaveFile(Bytes.ToArray(), FileLocation);
00081             }
00082             catch { }
00083         }
00084 
00085         #endregion
00086     }
00087 }
